author: Devan Cole, CNN
title: Obama suggests a robust system of testing is needed before US can ease measures
description: Former President Barack Obama on Wednesday said it would not be feasible to relax current measures to combat the spread of coronavirus without a "robust system of testing and monitoring — something we have yet to put in place nationwide."
content:
Washington (CNN)Former President Barack Obama on Wednesday said it would not be feasible to relax current measures to combat the spread of coronavirus without a "robust system of testing and monitoring something we have yet to put in place nationwide."
